channel.title: Compiler failz
channel.description:
compiler says: command' is not recognized as operable program or batch file.
if tryed to fix it..
first it said cant find pad.. fixt that but now this problem??
can someone help me
[IMG]http://www.mupload.nl/img/gqwxykxidc7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.mupload.nl/img/om4wux7htda.png[/img]
i dont know what i am doing wrong? :(

item.title: Compiler failz
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

JRE is the java runtime environment. You need JDK, which is the developer’s kit. JRE doesn’t have the java compile executable.

Download the latest JDK here: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html
and I recommend Lin’s environment variable setter: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,375681.0.html

Read full topic
